Does anyone know why it comes with so many .ISO files?

Kjbaran, haven't downloaded the game, yet, but I think all those iso files are what, together, constitute the entire setup. You may just executed the setup from a random file but the installation extracted data from all of the files.

Kjbaran;

They're not .iso files, the are segments of a rar file. You hit extract on the main one, and it uses all of them to make one whole file from the sections.
